name: Papa Golem - VR
description:
- Requires Steam with Steam VR installed on your computer (it will launch automatically when you start the game)

-  Headphones highly recommended

- Just unzip and click Papa Golem .exe file to play.

- Game-pad recommended, Oculus controllers  works too.
Xbox and PS4 controllers should work out the box. You can add the game to your steam library if your want to configure a Steam Controller.

- VR Ready PC required (obviously)-   Tested on Oculus Rift, HTC Vive and Oculus Quest (requires Oculus link)

- Headphones highly recommended (yes again)

- Motion sickness warning: Avoid using the run function unless you are very conformable in VR environment

- Headphones highly recommended (seriously, it's a sound experience)

- Find Papa, good luck!
